trans-unit.source: Controls the ability to access files or folders through a **File** dialog box.
This class cannot be inherited.
This permission is typically used to provide limited access to user-specified files when <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> is not granted.
trans-unit.target: Questa autorizzazione viene in genere utilizzata per fornire accesso limitato a specificato dall'utente quando i file <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileIOPermission> non è stata concessa.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> class.
A bitwise combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> values.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> class with the specified access.
The <paramref name="access" /> parameter is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> values.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> values (<see langword="Unrestricted" /> or <see langword="None" />).
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission" /> class with either restricted or unrestricted permission, as specified.
Creates either fully restricted (`None`) or `Unrestricted` access to **File** dialog boxes.
trans-unit.target: Consente di creare un con restrizioni (`None`) o `Unrestricted` l'accesso a **File** finestre di dialogo.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="state" /> parameter is not a valid value of <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.
Gets or sets the permitted access to files.
The permitted access to files.
An attempt is made to set the <paramref name="access" /> parameter to a value that is not a valid combination of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess" /> values.
Creates and returns an identical copy of the current permission.
A copy of the current permission.
A copy of the permission represents the same access to resources as the original permission.
trans-unit.target: Una copia dell'autorizzazione rappresenta lo stesso accesso alle risorse dell'autorizzazione originale.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding used to reconstruct the permission.
Reconstructs a permission with a specified state from an XML encoding.
The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not a valid permission element.
-or-
The version number of the <paramref name="esd" /> parameter is not supported.
A permission to intersect with the current permission.
It must be the same type as the current permission.
Creates and returns a permission that is the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
A new permission that represents the intersection of the current permission and the specified permission.
This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
The intersection of two permissions is a permission that describes the set of operations they both describe in common.
trans-unit.target: L'intersezione delle due autorizzazioni è un'autorizzazione che descrive il set di operazioni che hanno in comune.

trans-unit.source: Only a demand that passes both original permissions will pass the intersection.
trans-unit.target: Solo una richiesta che supera entrambe le autorizzazioni originali passerà l'intersezione.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
This permission must be the same type as the current permission.
Determines whether the current permission is a subset of the specified permission.
<see langword="true" /> if the current permission is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
The current permission is a subset of the specified permission if the current permission specifies a set of operations that is wholly contained by the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Se l'autorizzazione corrente specifica un set di operazioni che è interamente contenuto l'autorizzazione specificata, l'autorizzazione corrente è un subset dell'autorizzazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: For example, a permission for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.Open> access is a subset of a permission for <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.OpenSave> access.
trans-unit.target: Ad esempio, un'autorizzazione per <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.Open> accesso è un subset di un'autorizzazione per <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermissionAccess.OpenSave> accesso.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
Returns a value indicating whether the current permission is unrestricted.
<see langword="true" /> if the current permission is unrestricted; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
An unrestricted permission represents access to all resources protected by the permission.
trans-unit.target: Un'autorizzazione senza restrizioni rappresenta l'accesso a tutte le risorse protette dall'autorizzazione.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of the permission and its current state.
An XML encoding of the permission, including state information.
A permission to combine with the current permission.
It must be of the same type as the current permission.
Creates a permission that is the union of the current permission and the specified permission.
A new permission that represents the union of the current permission and the specified permission.

The result of a call to <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission.Union%2A> is a permission that represents all operations represented by both the current permission and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Il risultato di una chiamata a <xref:System.Security.Permissions.FileDialogPermission.Union%2A> è un'autorizzazione che rappresenta tutte le operazioni indicate sia dell'autorizzazione corrente e l'autorizzazione specificata.

trans-unit.source: Any demand that passes either permission passes their union.
trans-unit.target: Qualsiasi richiesta che passa l'autorizzazione passa l'unione.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="target" /> parameter is not <see langword="null" /> and is not of the same type as the current permission.
